ygData.subject: Re: Human SK god and stats?
ygData.msgSnippet: If you only play Trolls, be careful about creatures that attack with poison! I had played Cronik so long that I didn t worry about poison attacks against my DE
ygData.messageBody:
If you only play Trolls, be careful about creatures that attack with poison!
I had played Cronik so long that I didn't worry about poison attacks against
my DE Rogue because I was used to the troll regen rate for HPs. Let me tell
you I have stopped attacking poisonous creatures with him. I died more
times than I care to mention.

--
Setekh <Dark Omen>
5th Season DE Rogue
Bertoxx
--
Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
15th Season TSK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxx


----- Original Message -----
From: <gkays@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 2:30 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Human SK god and stats?


| From: <gkays@...>
|
| I've have 2 TSK characters, but have tired of both because of the crushing
EXP penalty, so I though I'd try out a human SK. A few questions:
|
| 1) What is the best god for HSK? Innoruuk or Bertox? Which cities can
each enter safely without having to kill anything? I'm assuming the human
cities plus High Hold for both, plus Neriak for Innoruuk SK's. Can either
safely enter a city on either Faydwer or Erudin?
|
| 2) Starting stats. I was thinking +5 Str and + 15 AGI to set each to 90.
Any thoughts on what a good Str value is. Should I bump it to 100. How
heavy is medium armor?
|
| Thanks for any input.
|
| Scragg Wraithbone (22nd TSK on Bristlebane)
| Scregg Wraithbone (7th TSK on Mith. Marr)
|
| | -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
| -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
